title: What's the best poem you can write? - Quora

response.answer_text: A poem, I believe, is very subjective; what is good for you may not be good for me. And it’s a continuous process, so you never know which one is your magnum opus. Here’s one of my favorite ones. Alone You are a traveler, you have to walk alone.When the thoughts in your mind begin to hatchWhen you have a new destiny to follow When you have to begin from scratch You need ‘good luck’ but there is no one to say ‘hello’ Like at dawn, the morning light shone You are a traveler, you have to walk alone. You have begun; you took your first stepNow you know there is a lot of work to do You look around to find someone for help But to support your struggles you notice only a few Like the heat at noon, the hardships have grown You are a traveler, you have to walk alone. Now you succeed, you are at the topYou will be surrounded by praise and prize When the life is hard, when you seem to go flop To help you stand up, these hands never rise Don’t you get flattered by this success and fame With every new day you will have a difficulty to tame Like evening, when the sun says ‘another good day has gone’ You are a traveler, you have to walk alone. If you have failed in your ambitionYou may feel heartbroken and dead But you need to remember this condition These petty failures should not make you sad After the darkness there rises a new day You just can’t let go, you need to stay Like the night, when even the shadows are long gone You are a traveler, you have to walk alone. Good and bad times come and goYou only reap what you sow Your instinct to never fall down will pay Your desire to succeed will make your day Every task is a challenge, the reward is the throne You have to work hard to make it your own Even if you are lonely, you should not moan Because you are a traveler, you have to walk alone.

This one is for the best person in my life…. ……………………………………………………………….. Hardly did I ever say… Now can’t make more delay… This is you who knows me the most… You find me when I get lost… The way you want me to be… Neither did I care nor did I see… You have for me is love and care… But I stay busy in my own sphere… You worry for my health and food… Then why my tone becomes rude… Your ways to life ,I find old… Many times you get my scold… How do you read my hidden tears… Even I don’t show what I bear… You always forget even if I fight… Others don’t care how much I’m right… What you are for me,I can’t show… But love for you always on grow… Knowns ,friends and many others… Nobody can be like the MOTHER… … ………………………………………………………………. Wherever I go mom…I always think of you…I worry for you… I don’t think you know how much I LOVE YOU MOM…
